lui 16           
andi $2, $1, 31       
ori  $3, $1, 31       
xori $4, $1, 15       
add  $5, $2, $3       
sub  $6, $3, $2       
slt  $7, $5, $6       
sltu $1, $6, $5       
sll  $2, $3, 3        
srl  $3, $3, 2        
sra  $4, $4, 2        
ror  $5, $4, 1        
sw   $5, 10($0)       
lw   $6, 10($0)       
bne  $5, $6, diff     
beq  $5, $6, same     
blt  $2, $3, less     
bge  $3, $2, greater  
diff: addi $5, $5, -5       
same: addi $6, $6, 5        
less: sub $2, $3, $2       
greater: or $3, $3, $2       
jal exit             
exit: jr $7
